import React, { PureComponent } from 'react' export class Welcome extends PureComponent { constructor() { super() this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this) } handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault() const data = new FormData(event.target) fetch('https://goldv2.herokuapp.com/api/auth/register', { method: 'POST', body: data, }) } render() { return (

Sign In to BKS MyGold

Change Language Guest Screen
) } } export default Welcome
